headline: Aptiv PLC (APTV) Advances Growth Strategy with EDS Spin-Off and Strong Earnings
summary: Aptiv PLC (NYSE:APTV) is one of the best manufacturing stocks to invest in now. On February 2, Aptiv PLC (NYSE:APTV) Chief Executive Officer Kevin Clark announced plans to spin off the EDS business as Versigent, resulting in two optimally positioned independent companies. The divestment comes on the heels of Aptiv PLC delivering record revenue, operating […]

headline: Jeep maker Stellantis posts first annual loss in company history after EV writedowns
summary: The results come shortly after the auto giant scaled back its EV ambitions following a major strategic shift.
